sub_title1: Pudding is a blockchain-based metaverse ecosystem platform that provides users with digital assets, a marketplace, and NFT exchange capabilities.
card_content1: Users can buy or sell land in the metaverse world called Pudding World, create and experience content, and generate revenue.
card_content2: The goal is to combine blockchain and token economy within the existing metaverse platform to guarantee the value of assets in the metaverse and provide user-friendly services.
card_content3: If you own land, you can collect a fixed amount of Pudding every day, and it will go through a halving every two years.
card_content4: Also, if you hold Pudding through the KlaySwap Pair Deposit Pool, you can receive Pudding with high interest every day.
